CONJUGATES: more acceptable | most acceptable | acceptably (adv) | acceptability (n)
ETYMOLOGY: From Old French acceptable, from Late Latin acceptabilis, from acceptare ('to accept') + -abilis ('able to be').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Good enough or satisfactory; meeting minimum requirements or standards.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 可接受的；令人满意的；合格的；达到最低标准的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The quality of the final product was acceptable, considering the tight deadline.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 考虑到最后期限很紧张，最终产品的质量是可以接受的。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Allowed, approved, or generally agreed upon as appropriate by a specific group or society.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 合乎规范的；被社会、群体或规则允许或认可的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Loud chewing is not considered acceptable behavior in a formal dining setting.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 在正式的用餐场合，大声咀嚼被认为是不被允许的行为。
